sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects requests to disable Microsoft Defender features using PowerShell commands

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description:
Detects instances of svchost.exe running with an unusual or uncommon command line parameter by excluding known legitimate or common patterns.
This could point at a file masquerading as svchost, a process injection, or hollowing of a legitimate svchost instance.

match_context.values: @{CommandLine=%WINDIR%\system32\svchost.exe; Image=C:\Windows\system32\svchost.exe; EventID=1}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects the creation of scheduled tasks by user accounts via the "schtasks" utility.

match_context.values: @{Hashes=SHA1=3A8EFD34E448B6E8905DDFF2B49816C233927ACD,MD5=F8564018F0382D7F6EC0515D38AD7966,SHA256=F0024EB58326ECAE6437237C3125CE75BE6C621EA4B1303FD5B9DFE96B1DFF32,IMPHASH=96F93525922FF1BB66DEE7D1A85E7A11; CurrentDirectory=C:\Users\Bruno\Desktop\; OriginalFileName=schtasks.exe; Product=Microsoft\xae Windows\xae Operating System; Description=Task Scheduler Configuration Tool; FileVersion=10.0.22621.1 (WinBuild.160101.0800); ParentCommandLine="C:\Users\Bruno\Desktop\mdrazald (2).exe"; CommandLine=schtasks /Create /SC ONDEMAND /TN WindowsSystemUpdate /TR "\"C:\Users\Bruno\Desktop\mdrazald (2).exe\"" /F /RL HIGHEST /RU SYSTEM; EventID=1; ParentImage=C:\Users\Bruno\Desktop\mdrazald (2).exe; IntegrityLevel=High; Image=C:\Windows\SysWOW64\schtasks.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Potential PowerShell Obfuscation Using Alias Cmdlets
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects Set-Alias or New-Alias cmdlet usage. Which can be use as a mean to obfuscate PowerShell scripts

match_context.values: @{ScriptBlockText=Set-Alias -Name ncim -Value New-CimInstance  -Option ReadOnly, AllScope -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Path=; ScriptBlockId=76225838-8cfb-4f33-89c5-d68068435e49; MessageTotal=1; MessageNumber=1; EventID=4104}

@{ScriptBlockText=Set-Alias -Name ncim -Value New-CimInstance  -Option ReadOnly, AllScope -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; MessageTotal=1; ScriptBlockId=46b1536e-f782-47fb-9073-6167337822cd; Path=; EventID=4104; MessageNumber=1}

@{ScriptBlockText=Set-Alias -Name ncim -Value New-CimInstance  -Option ReadOnly, AllScope -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Path=; ScriptBlockId=25f51385-cca0-427c-b787-f7ae10ade053; MessageTotal=1; EventID=4104; MessageNumber=1}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Local accounts, System Owner/User discovery using operating systems utilities

match_context.values: @{CommandLine=%WINDIR%\syswow64\whoami.exe; Image=C:\Windows\syswow64\whoami.exe; EventID=1}

attributes.magic: PE32 executable (GUI) Intel 80386, for MS Windows
